SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Natural Sciences is arc {Health Sciences}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Natural Sciences?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Natural Sciences is arc {Computer Science}.

VPR.A: {Natural Sciences} has the largest output flow.

VPR.A: {Health Sciences} has the largest input flow.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 537? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {597} from {Natural Sciences} to {Health Sciences}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 203? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 203 and 273? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Natural Sciences to Health Sciences or from Computer Science to Natural Sciences?
NC.A: The flow from {Natural Sciences} to {Health Sciences} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Computer Science to Natural Sciences, from Natural Sciences to Health Sciences, or from Health Sciences to Natural Sciences?
NC.A: The flow from {Natural Sciences} to {Health Sciences} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {Computer Science}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {Health Sciences} and {Natural Sciences}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Computer Science, Arc Natural Sciences, Arc Health Sciences}.
